Main Page | Namespace List | Class List | File List | Namespace Members | Class Members | File Members

catalogAccess File List

Here is a list of all files with brief descriptions:
catalog.cxx [code]Basic routines for Catalog class. The 3 static members should be read in configuration files in the future. The methods give information on: these static members, the few members that describe the catalog itself, the quantity data (with or without selection)
catalog.h [code]Declaration for the Catalog class. Four symbolic constants are defined (used for C array size)
catalog_io.cxx [code]Read/write (or import/export) routines for Catalog class. Methods exist to access both files: ASCII or fits (writing only BINARY table, reading any table format). Methods to load catalog through web are placeholders
catalog_ioText.cxx [code]Read/write (or import/export) routines for CDS text file
catalog_sel.cxx [code]Selection routines for Catalog class. Provide methods to MAKE the selection (READING selection is in catalog.cxx). Selection can be defined with no row, it will be used with importSelected() method
main_test.cxx [code]Test program to exercise catalogAccess interface
mainpage.h [code]
quantity.cxx [code]Implementation for the Quantity class. Contains only the copy constructor definition and the 3 methods to print results (error, warning or log) on screen (via cout for log, or cerr)
quantity.h [code]Declaration for the Quantity class and the 3 printing functions. These functions should be replaced by dedicated GLAST functions. One symbolic constant is defined, could be replaced by a const variable (6 already exist for basic limits or conversion)
release.notes [code]Package catalogAccess
Generated on Wed Feb 1 14:22:18 2006 for catalogAccess by 1.3.7
